$HYPE  dropped 3.03% in the past 24 hours, underperforming the broader crypto market (-1.2%) as risk-off sentiment deepened (Fear & Greed Index: 25) and leverage was flushed from the system. Open Interest declined by 5.91% alongside long liquidations, reinforcing downside momentum after price broke below the $28.27 swing low.   Technically, RSI dipping to 29.8 signals short-term oversold conditions, but in a Bitcoin-led market (Altcoin Season Index: 18) $HYPE ‚Äôs high beta and rising BTC correlation continue to magnify weakness.   Notably, spot volume jumped over 22%, hinting at selective dip-buying around the $26‚Äì28 Fibonacci zone, though bearish MACD structure keeps pressure intact. Will buyers defend this support zone convincingly, or does a weak BTC reaction open the door for another continuation lower? Ôªø#Altcoin Season#
